attributes.action: Allow, free of charge, parcels up to 2 Kg in weight, to be sent by loved ones/relatives to Service Personnel in Afghanistand and Iraq
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At the moment, you are only allowed free "blue'ies" for your Husband/wife/girlfriend/boyfriend/son daughter etc.
Please urge the Government to do something decent, for once, and allow free parcels to be sent to those serving in places of action
